import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Link } from 'bumbag';

# Link

## Import

```jsx
import { Link } from 'bumbag'
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Link href="https://google.com">Click me</Link>
```
